word_mean: 命名，命名法：一种命名系统，例如对解剖结构和生物等的命名系统。见Nomina Anatomica

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from French, from Latin nomenclatura, from nomen 'name' + clatura 'calling, summoning' (from calare 'to call')

entry.tran: 命名法;专门名词确定法
entry.def: The nomenclature of a particular set of things is the system of naming those things.
